mapper.insert: insert into SpecialtyPlan(specialtyId, specialtyName, planParameters, startDatetime, endDatetime) values (#{specialtyId}, #{specialtyName}, #{planParameters}, #{startDatetime}, #{endDatetime})
mapper.select: select id, specialtyId, specialtyName, planParameters, startDatetime, endDatetime from classInCourse where specialtyId = #{specialtyId}
